Title: Prohibits the packaging, sale and distribution of confectionery and candy designed to resemble a tobacco product
Summary: Prohibits the packaging, sale and distribution of confectionery and candy designed to resemble a tobacco product.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-mm-4, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the packaging, sale and distribution of confectionery and candy designed to resemble a tobacco product
